name: DesktopVRIK
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Adds VRIK to Desktop avatars. No longer will you be a liveless sliding statue~!
Adds the small feet stepping when looking around on Desktop.

Additional option to emulate VRChat-like hip movement if you like being fish.
changelog:
- Simplified VRIK calibration to avoid low heel issue.
- Removed rushed compatibility mode.
- Added checks for valid Humanoid rigs.
- Added PlantFeet & EnforceViewPosition Settings.
- Added Weight option for the VRChat-like hip movement.
